description: This file defines a mock class `FrontPanelIndicatorMock` for unit testing, which inherits from `device::FrontPanelIndicator::FrontPanelIndicatorImpl`. It declares mocked methods for the `FrontPanelIndicator` interface, enabling testing of components that depend on this interface without requiring actual hardware interaction.
external_methods: void setBrightness(const int brightness, const bool toPersist)
void setColor(const device::FrontPanelIndicator::Color &newColor, const bool toPersist)
void setColorInt(const uint32_t color, const bool toPersist)

classes.name: FrontPanelIndicatorMock
classes.description: A mock class for the FrontPanelIndicator interface used in testing, providing mocked implementations for its methods.

methods.name: getInstanceString
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of a FrontPanelIndicator instance by string name.

methods.name: getInstanceInt
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of a FrontPanelIndicator instance by integer ID.

methods.name: setState
methods.description: Mocks setting the on/off state of the indicator.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the name of the indicator.

methods.name: setBrightness
methods.description: Mocks setting the brightness level of the indicator.

methods.name: getBrightness
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the current brightness level, considering persistence.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Mocks setting the color of the indicator using a Color object.

methods.name: setColorInt
methods.description: Mocks setting the indicator color using a 32-bit integer value.

methods.name: getBrightnessLevels
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the available brightness levels, min, and max values.

methods.name: getColorMode
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the current color mode.

methods.name: getColorName
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the name of the current color.

methods.name: getSupportedColors
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the supported colors as a list.

calls: void setBrightness(const int brightness, const bool toPersist)
void setColor(const device::FrontPanelIndicator::Color &newColor, const bool toPersist)
void setColorInt(const uint32_t color, const bool toPersist)
